t: How to get and EAN number from amazon
s: The EAN/UPC barcode is not given to you by Amazon, you have to buy them from GS1. You can also apply for an exemption. Amazon use FNSKU labels to help track a seller’s stock, which is also a barcode, and is generally put over the top of the UPC barcodes. They will usually apply labels for ...

You are required to use the UPC/EAN on the item. an EAN may get flagged by the USA system if that is where you are trying to list the item. If you are the brand owner, you are to use the product identifier registered to your company and product.

t: How do I get an Amazon EAN exemption? | Koongo Help Center
s: Amazon offers an EAN (GTIN) exemption that allows sellers to list products without a barcode, a useful option for those selling handmade, custom-made, or private label products.
